com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

Interface MarkingColorProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMarkingColorProvider, PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider

    public interface MarkingColorProvider
    The interface MarkingColorProvider is used to get colors for markings. See MarkingType

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MarkingColorProvider.Util
      The class MarkingColorProvider.Util provides util methods for frequently needed MarkingColorProvider operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(PluginSettings pluginSettings) 
      MarkingColor provideColor(MarkingType markingType)
      Provides a color for a MarkingType.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(PluginSettings pluginSettings)
        Parameters:
        pluginSettings - The plugin settings you want to use to query the MarkingColors for the MarkingTypes.

      • provideColor

        MarkingColor provideColor(MarkingType markingType)
        Provides a color for a MarkingType. Note: Use MarkingColorProvider.Util.provideColor(MarkingColorProvider, Flag) if you have to provide a color for a Flag.
        Parameters:
        markingType - The MarkingType a MarkingColor should be provided for.
        Note:You might want to use MarkingType.getMarkingTypeForFlag(Flag) or MarkingType.getMarkingTypeForFlags(java.util.Set).
        Returns:
        the MarkingColor for the MarkingType
